<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vorpal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=308)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a slashing melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally created as a means of slaying the legendary jabberwock, _vorpal_ weapons prove equally effective against nearly any foe with a head.

<document level="2" id="action-189" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
